description:
TAG TEAM LEAGUE

TEAM RED

Ariel X & Samantha Sin
Combined HT: 127"
Combined WT: 235lbs
Record: (0-1)

TEAM BLUE

Isis Love & Jade Marxxx
Combined HT:133"
Combined WT: 265lbs
Record:(0-0)

Welcome to Ultimate Surrender's second league match.
This is how Red vs Blue should be. Four girls,
non-scripted, real tag team action..

The rules are set: (1) Three tags per team, per round.
(2) Three 12-minute non-scripted wrestling rounds. (3)
Last round consists of the winners tying up,
dominating, humiliating, and brutally fucking the
losers.

Team Red: Lost their first match and cannot afford to
lose another. Anchored by veteran Ariel "The Assassin"
X. This team lost its first match by only 17pts in
the very last minute of the match. Since Samantha "The
Python" Sin is getting stronger with each match, the
Team hopes to dominate and fuck the more experienced
Blue team.

Team Blue: The only team to feature wrestlers from the
very first season of Ultimate Surrender, their
experience is unmatched by any other team in the
league. Anchored by beautiful Isis "The Goddess" Love,
this team is favored to take home the Championships.
With Jade "The Trouper" Marxxx at The Goddess's side,
this team is fast, big, and strong.

Once again the match went down to the last minute, and
we have a loser after 36 minutes of brutal wrestling.
Heart breaking for the losers, but sweet, sweet
victory for the winners! Which team got fucked and
humiliated for losing? Which team got tied up and
dominated by the victors?
title: TAG TEAM LEAGUE
